;;;49     unsigned LCD_Color2Index_556(LCD_COLOR Color) {
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
000002  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;50       int r,g,b;
;;;51       r = (Color>> (8  - R_BITS)) & R_MASK;
000004  f3c10485          UBFX     r4,r1,#2,#6
;;;52       g = (Color>> (16 - G_BITS)) & G_MASK;
000008  f3c122c4          UBFX     r2,r1,#11,#5
;;;53       b = (Color>> (24 - B_BITS)) & B_MASK;
00000c  f3c143c4          UBFX     r3,r1,#19,#5
;;;54       return r + (g << R_BITS) + (b << (G_BITS + R_BITS));
000010  eb041082          ADD      r0,r4,r2,LSL #6
000014  eb0020c3          ADD      r0,r0,r3,LSL #11
;;;55     }
000018  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;56

                  LCD_Index2Color_556 PROC
;;;60     */
;;;61     LCD_COLOR LCD_Index2Color_556(int Index) {
00001a  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
00001c  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;62       unsigned int r,g,b;
;;;63       /* Seperate the color masks */
;;;64       r = Index                                  & R_MASK;
00001e  f001043f          AND      r4,r1,#0x3f
;;;65       g = (Index >> R_BITS)                      & G_MASK;
000022  f3c11284          UBFX     r2,r1,#6,#5
;;;66       b = ((unsigned)Index >> (R_BITS + G_BITS)) & B_MASK;
000026  f3c123c4          UBFX     r3,r1,#11,#5
;;;67       /* Convert the color masks */
;;;68       r = r * 255 / R_MASK;
00002a  ebc42004          RSB      r0,r4,r4,LSL #8
00002e  f04f053f          MOV      r5,#0x3f
000032  fbb0f4f5          UDIV     r4,r0,r5
;;;69       g = g * 255 / G_MASK;
000036  ebc22002          RSB      r0,r2,r2,LSL #8
00003a  f04f051f          MOV      r5,#0x1f
00003e  fbb0f2f5          UDIV     r2,r0,r5
;;;70       b = b * 255 / B_MASK;
000042  ebc32003          RSB      r0,r3,r3,LSL #8
000046  fbb0f3f5          UDIV     r3,r0,r5
;;;71       return r + (g<<8) + (((U32)b)<<16);
00004a  eb042002          ADD      r0,r4,r2,LSL #8
00004e  eb004003          ADD      r0,r0,r3,LSL #16
;;;72     }
000052  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;73     
                          ENDP

;;;77     */

;;;79       return 0xffff;
